metadata.synopsis: A deranged killer stalks stranded motorists in an abandoned factory.

reviews: The serial killer is nothing but a Freddy Kreuger clone with a hint of "Mindbender" and "Lawnmower Man" for good measure, while Reid doesn't do much to escalate the tedious writing...
Smashes together some interesting ideas with a bunch of tired, old ones.
To her credit, Tara Reid does pronounce this one correctly.
